translation:
Citizen

Having before this Government the official letter by copy, which on the 11th of the last month you addressed to the citizen Dr. Judge of Law of that District, whom you refused to obey as Chief of Police of the same; and since this same Government has agreed with the measure taken by the General-in-chief of the army, ordering that the said Dr. Judge of Law reassume the functions of General Chief of District Police, seeing that this provision is in harmony with the laws of the Empire of Brazil, which we provisionally follow; it orders me to consider you dismissed from the said position of General Chief of Police of this department, which you have discharged with so much honor: which I communicate to you for your understanding and due execution.

God keep you. Secretariat of Justice in Alegrete, September 27, 1842. To the citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. José Pedroso de Albuquerque.

Secretariat of the Republic Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães — Boqueirão. From the Minister of Justice. Official letter from the Minister of Justice giving me my dismissal.
